comment: at some point, this file should become empty and unnecessary.
condition_retire_adolescent: m_c decides {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}'d rather spend {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} time helping around camp and entertaining the kits; {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'re/'s} warmly welcomed into the elders' den.
condition_retire_adolescent_ceremony: {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/are/is} given the name %{newname} in honor of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} contributions to %{clan}Clan.
condition_retire_no_leader: m_c has decided to retire from normal Clan duty.
condition_retire_normal: Seeing m_c struggling the last few moons, lead_name approaches {PRONOUN/m_c/object} and promises that no one would think less of {PRONOUN/m_c/object} for retiring early, and that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} would still be a valuable member of the Clan as an elder. m_c agrees; later that day, {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} elder ceremony is held.
rickroll: Never going to give r_c up, never going to let {PRONOUN/r_c/object} down, never going to run around and desert {PRONOUN/r_c/object}.
ceremony_leader_bloodthirsty: %{name} has become the new leader. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/stare/stares} down at {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Clanmates with unsheathed claws, promising a new era for the Clans.
ceremony_leader_1: %{oldname} has been promoted to the new leader of the Clan. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/travel/travels to the Moonstone immediately to get {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} nine lives and {VERB/m_c/are/is} hailed by {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} new name, %{newname}.
ceremony_leader_2: %{oldname} has become the new leader of the Clan. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/vow/vows} to protect the Clan, even at the cost of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} nine lives.
ceremony_leader_3: %{oldname} has received {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} nine lives and become the new leader of the Clan. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/feel/feels} like {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/are/is}n't ready for this new responsibility, but will try {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} best to do what is right for the Clan.
ceremony_closer: Visit %{name}'s profile to see {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} full leader ceremony.
